General.Name: Parent Capital Corp
General.Description: Parent Capital Corp., a public junior resource company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, development, and evaluation of resource properties. The company was formerly known as Century Energy Ltd. and changed its name to Parent Capital Corp. in January 2021. Parent Capital Corp. is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1200-750 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada

1.Name: Mr. Scott C. Davis C.A., CPA, CA, CGA, CPA
1.Title: Chief Financial Officer
